statements: DELETE FROM fashion_brands WHERE order_id = 100 AND return_id = 200;
DELETE FROM fashion_brands WHERE brand_id = 10 AND order_id = 100;
DELETE FROM fashion_brands WHERE return_id = 15 AND shipment_id = 200;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND order_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM brands WHERE brand_name = 'Example Brand';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE brand_id = 1 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Delivered' AND shipment_date >= '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE delivery_date < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'In Transit';
